name: Operational Tree Tycoon
description:
Operational Tree Tycoon (OTT) is a game where you can ruin the environment! No, literally. Take place as a filthy businessperson who knows nothing better than cutting trees! That's really all this game is.

How to Play:

Hello, welcome to Tree Cutters Inc.! Login to your computer, and start reading those business offers! If you see one you like, press thumbs up and get out into the field. With WASD or the ARROW KEYS, control the machine and cut some trees. Watch out for protesters, and have fun building a monopoly!
